DOC.brief_summary: This is a single center, randomized, single-blind, placebo-controlled study to evaluate the safety and biochemical effects of niacinamide on metabolic parameters of the kidney in patients undergoing cardiac surgery.
DOC.brief_title: Molecular Effects of Vitamin B3 (Niacinamide) in Acute Kidney Injury
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criteria 1. All patients undergoing cardiac surgery with the use of cardiopulmonary bypass at high risk for acute kidney injury.
